Tests on `z.table`. Requires `kc,lut`.
Where `z.table` are the daily zone sums for a given year.

```{r}
x <- unique(z.table$crop)[!(unique(z.table$crop) %in% kc.lut$value)]
z.sub <- z.table[z.table$crop %in% x,]
unique(z.sub$crop) == x
rowSums(z.sub[,-c(1,2)])
```
